Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone. 

Been a forum lurker for a long time, finally decided to get an account. I have been playing KSP for a while now, almost over a year and a half now. 

Looking forward to having a bit of fun here. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
Trust me, joining the forums is well worth it. I've been hooked for a year and a half now! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Welcome!
Welcome! One small quibble- shouldn't your location be *kerbtucky*? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Welcome! One small quibble- shouldn't your location be *kerbtucky*? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

In that case, I live in Wiskerbsin! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Wisconsin? Get it?! It's stretch. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Trust me, joining the forums is well worth it. I've been hooked for a year and a half now! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Welcome!

Thank you!

> 
> Welcome! One small quibble- shouldn't your location be *kerbtucky*? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Kerbtucky, I like that!
